ygData.subject: RE: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: You are wrong, your cleric at the same level could not take as much damage as a warrior of the same level outfitted appropriately.
ygData.messageBody:
You are wrong, your cleric at the same level could not take as much damage
as a warrior of the same level outfitted appropriately.

> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:37 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> I totally agree with you,
>
> I play a cleric now more than my warrior, not because i find the warrior
> class dull, but because i find the cleric class the most interesting to
> play
> (especially if you are like me and you roleplay, being a dark elf cleric
> makes is really fun)
>
> When whoever said that when a cleric is fighting a grif and their party is
> dying would cower and run is obviously grouping with a COWARD! My cleric
> can
> take just as good as a warrior, my ac is damn high and my buffs add to
> that.
>
>
> Plus with my divine aura i am always the LAST party member to flee, i tell
> everyone i party with that i will die so they can run. Divine aura lets
> any
> cleric do this. But that all depends on the player themselves
>
> Dont knock a class till you play with the people who play it best.
>
> Rayne
>
> > ----------
> > From: Clancy[SMTP:tcashio3@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:39 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
> >
> > From: "Clancy" <tcashio3@...>
> >
> > Umm... whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell
> >
> > At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric. This class is amazing.
> If
> > you think all they do is heal, you are very very wrong. Their dd's do
> > stun
> > (amazing for rogues) and they can heal better than any other class. I
> > want
> > to see your two druids heal you to full from 1 bar of life
> >
> > Also if all you fight is yellows and reds you need to rethink your
> > leveling
> > process. Whites and blues are excellent to fight if you are in groups
> > that
> > handle large numbers well. Before you say all clerics do is heal, play
> > one,
> > or play with a good one.
> >
> >
